name: Verify Camera Repair Workflow
description: Validates the intended sequence for camera repair on Region 3, ensuring it is gated behind the diagnostic report.
testObjective: Ensure mission progression logic is enforced.
author: Christopher Rojas
preconditions: Diagnostic report has NOT been viewed

steps.action: Attempt to repair a malfunctioning camera before viewing report
steps.expected: Interaction is disabled or player is prompted to check diagnostics first

steps.action: Go to main control panel and view diagnostic report
steps.expected: Report plays and mission objective updates

steps.action: Return to camera and attempt repair
steps.expected: Repair interaction is now available and functions correctly
